ygData.subject: Re: Foxfingers
ygData.msgSnippet: Foxfingers froze in his tracks keeping one hand on his pistol. He d heard her name mentioned briefly as he ran away. Like I m expected to trust a Pred.? he

Foxfingers froze in his tracks keeping one hand on his pistol. He'd 
heard her name mentioned briefly as he ran away. "Like I'm expected 
to trust a Pred.?" he frowned glancing the room for a quick way out 
if he needed it. " I know how you handle intruders, I've been there 
one to many times. I'm not in any slagging hurry to go back." He 
transformed to fox and leapt at KitKat. with a name that ended in cat 
how tough can she be.

--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, logomorph@h... wrote:
> DarkMouse::
> 
> She ran after FoxFingers. "Slagging Maximals! ALways up to no good."
> 
> KitKat::
> She looked up and sw FoxFingers run into the lab. She stood up and 
> looked at him."I would presume your the intruder. I would suggest 
> that you stop running and give up now.  If you will stop and talk 
> with me, I will promise that no harm will come to you.  I am 
KitKat, 
> my word is my honor."
> 
> 
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, cyberwolf4@p... wrote:
> > (Hate to remind you that the autoguns would be confused by the 
> mirror 
> > chips and not know where Foxfingers is.)
> > 
> > One by one the mirror chips were blasted. a few shots later they 
> were 
> > destroyed. Foxfingers plan had worked, unfortunately he was out 
of 
> > chips. He held still as he could hoping the autoguns would think 
he 
> > was destroyed. He knew Darkmouse knew he was alive so it wouldn't 
> be 
> > long till she corrected them. He had two options, either escape 
or 
> > find a place on the ship that didn't have autoguns. If he left 
the 
> > outside guns would reduce him to slag. He scanned the ship and 
> found 
> > an area of the ship without guns. He stayed close to the wall 
> > sneaking under a few cameras. He slowly worked his way to the 
safe 
> > spot. (The science lab.)
> > 
> > 
> > --- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, logomorph@h... wrote:
> > > DarkMouse:;
> > > 
> > > She ran after him. "AUTOGUN, FIRE ON THE INTRUDER!"
> > > 
> > > The autoguns opened fire on FoxFingers
> > > 
> > > --- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, "CYBERWOLF4" <cyberwolf4@p...> wrote:
> > > > Foxfingers took off in a mad dash rounding the corner with 
> > foxlike 
> > > agility.
> > > > either he'd startled the bot after him or she was a really 
bad 
> > > shot. (Like
> > > > most villains)
> > > > 
> > > > He came to a hault around another corner just now noticing 
that 
> > > this time he
> > > > was armed and could strike back. He drew his pistol and 
readied 
> > > himself.
> > > > It'd been a while since he'd used a weapon, he wasn't sure if 
> he 
> > > still
> > > > could. he just knew that he'd been caught before trying to 
raid 
> > > Pred camps.
> > > > He was in no hurry to get caught again.
